name: user_reviews
description: Fetch the most recent user reviews for a given application

store.description: The app store that you would like to retrieve results from (apple or google)
store.title: Store

id.description: The identifier for the application you would like to retrieve reviews for
id.title: Id

language.description: The two-letter code for the language you want results in (ISO-639-1). Optional
language.title: Language

name: app_details
description: Fetch app store details for a given application

store.description: The app store that you would like to retrieve results from (apple or google)
store.title: Store

id.description: The identifier for the application you would like to retrieve results for
id.title: Id

language.description: The two-letter code for the language you want results in (ISO-639-1). Optional
language.title: Language

name: app_search
description: Fetch the list of search results for a given term

store.description: The app store that you would like to retrieve reviews from (apple or google)
store.title: Store

term.description: The search term you would like to retrieve app results for
term.title: Term

language.description: The two-letter code for the language you want results in (ISO-639-1). Optional
language.title: Language

name: autocomplete
description: Fetch a list of autocomplete terms for a given search term

store.description: The app store that you would like to retrieve reviews from (apple or google)
store.title: Store

term.description: The search term you would like to retrieve autocomplete results for
term.title: Term

language.description: The two-letter code for the language you want results in (ISO-639-1). Optional
language.title: Language
